Installation
============

* Install ``django-howl`` (or `download from PyPI <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-howl>`_):

.. code-block:: python

    pip install django-howl

* After Installation add it to ``INSTALLED_APPS`` in ``settings.py``:

.. code-block:: python

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        # other apps
        'howl',
    )
